title: Teen killed in shooting on Wecker Street
content:
Autoplay:One person shot on Wecker street in BuffaloCONNECTING...
BUFFALO, N.Y. (WKBW) - Police say one person is dead following a shooting in Buffalo.
Detectives were called to the 100 block of Wecker Street just before 11:30 p.m. Sunday night. Police say a 17-year old male was hit by gunfire, and has died. Police have ruled his death a homicide.
It's unclear if anyone else was injured.
